channel.title: Ranged Skill - PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
When I wield a bow - shortbow - mage short or w/e,and have arrows equipped, it still doesn't range them. It just says "there are not enough arrows in your quiver" and it doesnt do anything.
So to sum it up all together, when i try to range, i get the message "there are not enough arrows in your quiver" when I have arrows in my quiver.
Someone please help? I'll give you cookies if you do :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2008, 03:14:50 pm[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP! 11 views 0 replies :(

item.title: Ranged Skill - PLEASE HELP!

item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

When I wield a bow - shortbow - mage short or w/e,and have arrows equipped, it still doesn’t range them.
It just says “there are not enough arrows in your quiver” and it doesnt do anything.

So to sum it up all together,
when i try to range, i get the message “there are not enough arrows in your quiver” when I have arrows in my quiver.

Someone please help?
